casebody.data:
Marie A. CROSS and Samuel A. Scudder
v.
CAPITAL TRANSACTION GROUP, INC. d/b/a Captran, and Wayne Walker. No. 342P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Wayne C. Walker, Pro Se. Samuel A. Scudder, Raleigh, for Cross & Scudder. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 661 S.E.2d 778 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of July 2008 by Defendant (Wayne Walker) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of February 2009."

HUDSON, J., recused.
